alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 2:09PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Owyhee County through 245 PM MDT... At 208 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Juniper Basin Reservoir, or 20 miles west of Owyhee, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Juniper Basin Reservoir around 230 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
